title: Market share of leading companies in the coffee market in Germany 2016
summary: Jacobs_Douwe_Egberts was the leading Jacobs_Douwe_Egberts within the Jacobs_Douwe_Egberts coffee in Canada as of 2016 , controlling one third of the Market .
Tchibo is their main competitor with a Market share of 10.3 % .
The Market share of all Nestlé Jacobs_Douwe_Egberts Coffee was 23.2 % .
gold: This statistic illustrates the market share of leading companies in the German coffee market in 2016 . In the period of consideration , Tchibo had a market share of 12 percent .
